text: I may have mentioned this before but I
really like cooking savory things like
meat with fruit and today is no
exception I'm making a chicken and
apricot jam melt and to start off with
I'm gonna make my own Jam takes about 15
minutes it's really easy I have 2 pounds
of apricots and they go right into a
nice big pot and then half the amount of
sugar I do it by weight but that's about
a pound of sugar two and a half cups and
then the juice of half a lemon you can
put a pinch of salt in here too if you
want to and then all you need to do is
boil it sort of mashing it with a potato
masher can't really mash it in the very
beginning but it gets soft really
quickly and it usually only takes about
15 minutes to get nice and thick and
reduced leave it just don't worry about
it
so I have some boneless skinless chicken
breasts I'm gonna cut them in half so
that they're really nice and thin
because they're gonna go into the
broiler and they need to cook really
fast you have to slice them horizontally
the really thin cutlets cook so quickly
and you don't even need to pound them if
you cut them in half like this just make
sure you have a sharp knife and it's
super duper easy hand-washing a clean
kitchen is a safe kitchen okay I have
pre-made my marinade quarter cup of
white wine vinegar 2 tablespoons of
Dijon mustard some chopped garlic a
little bit of salt a little bit of
pepper just whisk that together and then
the chicken marinates in this it can go
for as little as 10 minutes and up to
overnight so say you do this in the
morning and then come home and cook it
at night I think that's a really good
plan I'm just gonna let it sit for a few
minutes while I finish up the rest of my
stuff and then I'm gonna do it right
away but it only gets better with age
straight to the stove oh look at this
it's boiling like crazy when it starts
off it boils really really aggressively
and gets all foamy and you can't see any
fruit and then as it cooks down slowly
the fruit comes to the top and the foam
goes away and that's when you know it's
almost done keep mashing it a little bit
with the potato masher it smells
fantastic apricots are one of those
things that actually taste better when
they're cooked or dried to me than they
do when they're fresh this is done I'm
just gonna turn it off and let it cool a
little bit and then get my chicken into
the broiler because it's marinated
it's got enough flavor just arrange the
chicken on a foil lined baking sheet in
a single layer they're gonna cook
superfast in the broiler because they're
so thick speed demon dinner I have my
broiler preheating I like to make sure
that it's nice and hot before I put
anything in while that's cooking I just
have a couple more things to do to grate
some cheddar cheese about a cup I prefer
something pretty sharp but it's up to
you what kind you like
into a ball the bread one long baguette
or one baguette they're all long right
cut it in half and then cut it
horizontally in half just because it's
easier to handle that way you don't have
to cut it in half first and then cut it
into eight pieces all right chicken
really smells good I need clean tongs
take the chicken off the baking sheet
cuz you're gonna put everything back
into the oven on the baking sheet pour
off the juice you don't want to the
bread to get soggy when it goes back in
the oven and then line up your bread and
spoon some of the jam on top now you do
not have to make the apricot jam I'm
just a little bit crazy so I like to
make my own jam but you don't have to
you can buy something the flavor of the
apricot jam and the mustard in the
marinade together is really kind of
special I love sweet and savory you're
probably bored of hearing me say that
back chicken goes on top of the
delightful Jam drape the chicken with a
little bit of ham maybe one slice per
well the last one and then after that to
hold everything together you sprinkle it
with that cheese and the cheese is gonna
melt in the broiler on top but it's
gonna be fantastic for sandwich straight
back into the broiler for a few seconds
just until the cheese melts this should
only take a couple of minutes
no feeling in my bone ah that makes me
so happy I can barely stand it this is a
dinner worthy sandwich if I ever saw one
they're too hot to taste really right
now but I can tell you one thing they're
gonna be a little toasty they're gonna
be a little salty a little sweet a
little tangy and a lot fantastically
delicious
